00009 #import "ListsViewController.h"
00010 #import "AlertPrompt.h"
00011 #import "List.h"
00012 #import "ListArticle.h"
00013 #import "IndividualListViewController.h"
00014 
00015 @implementation ListsViewController
00016 
00017 @synthesize managedObjectContext=managedObjectContext_;
00018 
00019 #pragma mark -
00020 #pragma mark Core data table view overrides
00021 
00022 - (void)managedObjectSelected:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject
00023 {
00024         IndividualListViewController *individualListViewController = [[IndividualListViewController alloc] initWithList:(List*)managedObject];
00025         [self.navigationController pushViewController:individualListViewController animated:YES];
00026         [individualListViewController release];
00027 }
00028 
00029 - (BOOL)canDeleteManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject {
00030         return YES;
00031 }
00032 
00033 - (void)deleteManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject {
00034         //Remove all articles
00035         NSSet *articles = ((List*)managedObject).articles;
00036         for (ListArticle *listArticle in articles) {
00037                 [managedObjectContext_ deleteObject:listArticle];
00038         }
00039         //Remove the list
00040         [managedObjectContext_ deleteObject:managedObject];
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 #pragma mark -
00045 #pragma mark View lifecycle
00046 
00047 - (void)viewDidLoad {
00048     [super viewDidLoad];
00049 
00050     // Add an add-button to the right on the navigationbar
00051         UIBarButtonItem *addButton = [[UIBarButtonItem alloc] initWithBarButtonSystemItem:UIBarButtonSystemItemAdd target:self action:@selector(createList)];
00052         self.navigationItem.rightBarButtonItem = addButton;
00053         [addButton release];
00054         
00055         // Add an edit-button to the left on the navigationbar
00056     self.navigationItem.leftBarButtonItem = self.editButtonItem;
00057         
00058         NSFetchRequest *request = [[NSFetchRequest alloc] init];
00059         request.entity = [NSEntityDescription entityForName:@"List" inManagedObjectContext:managedObjectContext_];
00060         request.sortDescriptors = [NSArray arrayWithObject:[NSSortDescriptor sortDescriptorWithKey:@"name"
00061                                                                                                                                                                          ascending:YES
00062                                                                                                                                                                           selector:@selector(caseInsensitiveCompare:)]];
00063         request.predicate = nil;
00064         request.fetchBatchSize = 20;
00065         
00066         NSFetchedResultsController *frc = [[NSFetchedResultsController alloc]
00067                                                                            initWithFetchRequest:request
00068                                                                            managedObjectContext:managedObjectContext_
00069                                                                            sectionNameKeyPath:nil
00070                                                                            cacheName:nil];
00071         frc.delegate = self;
00072         
00073         [request release];
00074         
00075         [self setFetchedResultsController:frc];
00076         [frc release];
00077         
00078         self.titleKey = @"name";
00079         self.searchKey = @"name";
00080 }
00081 
00082 #pragma mark -
00083 #pragma mark Events
00084 
00085 // Called when the add button is pressed
00086 - (void)createList {
00087         AlertPrompt *alertPrompt = [[AlertPrompt alloc] initWithTitle:@"Döp din lista" delegate:self cancelButtonTitle:@"Avbryt" okButtonTitle:@"Lägg till"];
00088         [alertPrompt show];
00089 }
00090 
00091 #pragma mark -
00092 #pragma mark Alert prompt delegate
00093 
00094 #define alertViewButtonOK 1
00095 
00096 - (void)alertView:(AlertPrompt *)alertPrompt clickedButtonAtIndex:(NSInteger)buttonIndex {
00097         if (buttonIndex == alertViewButtonOK) {
00098                 List *list = [NSEntityDescription insertNewObjectForEntityForName:@"List" inManagedObjectContext:self.managedObjectContext];
00099                 list.name = alertPrompt.textField.text;
00100                 list.creationDate = [NSDate date];
00101         }
00102 }
